question: Indiaâ€™s first public Electric Vehicle (EV) charging plaza has been set up in which state/UT?
explanation:
Union Minister RK Singh has recently inaugurated India's first public Electric Vehicle (EV) charging plaza in New Delhi.
The charging plaza with 5 chargers of different specifications, was established by Energy Efficiency Services Limited (EESL) in collaboration with New Delhi Municipal Council (NDMC). A joint initiative of EESL and USAID, Retrofit of air-conditioning to improve indoor air quality for safety and efficiency (RAISE) was also launched.
